title: Lifeless Planet Premier Edition-SKIDROW
description:
Release Group: SKIDROW (Scene)
Release Name: Lifeless.Planet.Premier.Edition-SKIDROW
Release Date: August 04, 2015
Retail Date: June 06, 2015
Filename: sr-lppe
Source: Steam
Size: 780 MB
Genre: Action, Adventure, Indie
Critics: N/A
Published by: Lace Games, KISS ltd
Developed by: Stage 2 Studios

The Premier Edition of the atmospheric sci-fi adventure Lifeless Planet is now available on PC and Mac. This remastered edition brings new content and improved graphics to the desktop versions of the game. While seeking life on a distant planet, an astronaut discovers an abandoned Russian town. He suspects his mission is a hoax until a mysterious young woman saves him from a strange and deadly phenomenonÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ 

Lifeless Planet is a third-person action-adventure that features an old-school sci-fi story and spectacular environments in the spirit of classic action-adventures. After a hard landing on the planet, the astronaut discovers the planet that was reported to be rich with life is instead a barren wasteland. When he goes searching for his crew, he makes a more startling discovery: evidence that humans have already been to this planet years ago! When he comes upon a deserted Soviet-era Russian town, he struggles to make sense of his mission. Did his light-speed travel to the planet send him back in time? Or is this all some strange Cold War hoax?
